contentrichtext.text: '''Asterope''' can refer to: * In Greek mythology: ** [[Asterope (Hesperide)]], a [[Hesperides|Hesperide]] ** [[Sterope (Pleiad)]], one of the Pleiades *** [[Asterope (star)]], one of the stars in the Pleiades cluster, named for the mythical figure ** Hesperia, the wife or desired lover of [[Aesacus]] and daughter of Cebren ** Asterope, mother of [[Peneleos]] by Hippalcimus ** Sterope, daughter of [[Cepheus, King of Tegea]] ** Asterope, an [[Oceanid]], mother of Acragas by Zeus * [[Asterope (butterfly)|''Asterope'' (butterfly)]], a butterfly genus * [[233 Asterope]], a main-belt asteroid * [[AsteRope]], a pair of parallel circumferential tethers circling an asteroid to enable improved [[extra-vehicular activity]] {{Disambiguation}}
